item.title: Queer Writer Justin Kuritzkes Breaks Down Lee & Allerton's Complicated Romance And Meaning Behind The Final Act
item.description: Queer screenwriter Justin Kuritzkes explains how his partnership with Luca Guadagnino has evolved since Challengers & why he added certain symbolism.

item.title: September 5 Interview: Director Tim Fehlbaum & Producer John Palmer Reveal Why You Need To See This Movie In Theaters
item.description: September 5 director Tim Fehlbaum and producer John Palmer reveal why they think people should see it in theaters, despite its heavy subject matter.
